dcterms:description: A standard benchmark for vision-and-language navigation that includes 10,800 panoramic views and 7,189 trajectories, each paired with three natural language instructions.
dcterms:title: Room-to-Room (R2R)

dcterms:description: A constructed subset based on the Room-to-Room dataset, designed to evaluate the robustness of navigation agents under perturbations.
dcterms:title: Path-Perturbed R2R (PP-R2R)
